name: 4D Number Plates (Pair)
description: Laser cut 4D characters with a height of 3mm. The depth is immediately noticeable, and the sharp edges add a crispness unlike any other.
size: The standard UK size for number plates are 520mm by 111mm. Please note this will vary if you opt for a shortened plate option. Shortened plates are cut down to a unique size depending on the length of your registration.

description: Laser cut 4D characters with a height of 3mm. The depth is immediately noticeable, and the sharp edges add a crispness unlike any other.
size: The standard UK size for number plates are 520mm by 111mm. Please note this will vary if you opt for a shortened plate option. Shortened plates are cut down to a unique size depending on the length of your registration.

name: Glass Coasters (x4)
description: Personalised glass coasters heat pressed with pictures or logos of your choice! These come with rubber feet to prevent slipping on tables and protect the surface it sits on.
